Name: POSSESSED BLOODY ASYLUM
About the game: In this virtual reality experience you suddenly wake up and you don't know where you are or how you got there. Find your way out alive! You must look for a weapon and ammunition to survive. Go around the place looking for keys that will allow you to go to the next level. The game has an autosave per level. This is no longer a GAME! * As soon as START GAME is pressed, knowledge of a specific language is not required. WARNING: This experience has Jump Scares! You're warned! Requires a virtual reality headset to play!
